Description: Angular wheelmade kaolinite cup in a typical Meroitic style with flat base, low angular shoulder and straight walls with direct rim. Distorted body. Broken base with surface flaking in some areas. Covered in cream slip interior and exterior. Exterior decorated with a frieze delineated by a brown painted line above and below, filled with painted lotus flower decorations with three petals in a horizontal line around the cup in brown and red. Incompletely re-assembled from fragments.
